flavorText:
"The music of blades against its silver armor merely inspires it to bellow more full-throated melodies."
—Huatli

foreignData.flavorText: „Der Klang von Schwertern, die auf seine silberne Rüstung prallen, veranlasst ihn nur dazu, noch bedrohlichere Laute auszustoßen." —Huatli
foreignData.name: Imperialer Ceratops
foreignData.text: Erzürnen — Immer wenn dem Imperialen Ceratops Schaden zugefügt wird, erhältst du 2 Lebenspunkte dazu.

foreignData.flavorText: "La música de los filos contra su armadura plateada apenas si le inspira a proferir unas melodías aún más profundas". —Huatli
foreignData.name: Ceratops imperial
foreignData.text: Enfurecer — Siempre que el Ceratops imperial reciba daño, ganas 2 vidas.

foreignData.flavorText: « La musique des lames frappant son armure d'argent l'inspire à beugler de plus puissantes mélodies. » —Huatli
foreignData.name: Cératops impérial
foreignData.text: Rage — À chaque fois que le Cératops impérial subit des blessures, vous gagnez 2 points de vie.

foreignData.flavorText: "La musica delle lame contro la sua corazza argentea non fa che ispirarlo a ruggire melodie ancor più tonanti." —Huatli
foreignData.name: Triceratopo Imperiale
foreignData.text: Infuriare — Ogniqualvolta viene inflitto danno al Triceratopo Imperiale, guadagni 2 punti vita.

foreignData.flavorText: 「銀鎧に打ち当たる刃の調べは、音曲を大声で唸ろうという気を起こさせるのよ。」 ――ファートリ
foreignData.name: 帝国のケラトプス
foreignData.text: 激昂 ― 帝国のケラトプスにダメージが与えられるたび、あなたは２点のライフを得る。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 恐竜

foreignData.flavorText: "칼날이 은갑옷과 부딪혀 내는 음색은 그것이 더욱 큰 소리로 포효하게 만들 뿐이다." —화틀리
foreignData.name: 제국의 케라톱스
foreignData.text: 격노 — 제국의 케라톱스가 피해를 입을 때마다, 당신은 생명 2점을 얻는다.

foreignData.flavorText: "A música das lâminas contra a armadura prateada só o inspira a rugir mais melodias guturais." — Huatli
foreignData.name: Cerátopo Imperial
foreignData.text: Enfurecer — Toda vez que Cerátopo Imperial sofre dano, você ganha 2 pontos de vida.

foreignData.flavorText: «Музыка клинков, звенящих по его серебряной броне, лишь вдохновляет его спеть в полный голос». — Уатли
foreignData.name: Имперский Цератопс
foreignData.text: Неистовство — Каждый раз, когда Имперскому Цератопсу наносятся повреждения, вы получаете 2 жизни.

foreignData.flavorText: 「刀剑与其银甲碰撞而成之铿锵声响，只会诱其以深邃嚎吼回应。」 ～华特莉
foreignData.name: 帝国犄角龙
foreignData.text: 激怒～每当帝国犄角龙受到伤害时，你获得2点生命。

foreignData.flavorText: 「刀劍與其銀甲碰撞而成之鏗鏘聲響，只會誘其以深邃嚎吼回應。」 ～華特莉
foreignData.name: 帝國犄角龍
foreignData.text: 激怒～每當帝國犄角龍受到傷害時，你獲得2點生命。

name: Imperial Ceratops
originalText: Enrage — Whenever Imperial Ceratops is dealt damage, you gain 2 life.

rulings.text: If your life total is brought to 0 or less at the same time that Imperial Ceratops is dealt damage, you lose the game before its enrage ability resolves.
If multiple sources deal damage to a creature with an enrage ability at the same time, most likely because multiple creatures blocked that creature, the enrage ability triggers only once.

If lethal damage is dealt to a creature with an enrage ability, that ability triggers. The creature with that enrage ability leaves the battlefield before that ability resolves, so it won’t be affected by the resolving ability.

text: Enrage — Whenever Imperial Ceratops is dealt damage, you gain 2 life.
